   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">个人介绍</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;刘&nbsp;亮，男，博士，北京邮电大学计算机学院副教授。2009年在北京邮电大学获博士学位，曾在美国TAMU进行访问研究。主要研究方向为多媒体、传感器网络。主持和参与多项国家自然科学基金、国家973项目、国家863项目和企业研发项目。在无线传感器网络与计算机视觉等方面取得一系列创新性成果，在IEEE&nbsp;Transactions、INFOCOM、ICC、Globecom、软件学报、电子学报等国际国内权威刊物和会议上发表论文近40篇。曾担任多个国际学术会议和刊物的论文评阅人。</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">承担课题</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;主持：<br>	国家自然科学基金青年项目“新一代视频监控网络中匹配无关的目标运动模式研究”；<br>	2011年度江苏省自然科学基金“视频传感器网络中目标定位追踪关键技术及原型系统研究”；<br>	国家自然科学基金重点项目“后IP网络体系结构及其机理探索”北邮子课题。<br>参与：<br>	国家重点基础研究发展计划（973计划）项目“物联网体系结构基础研究”（本人任项目办公室主任和学术骨干）；<br>	国家自然科学基金杰出青年项目“网络环境中多媒体计算”。</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">获奖和成果</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;博士论文《视频传感器网络中目标定位跟踪问题研究》获得中国计算机学会（CCF）2010年度优秀博士学位论文奖。</td>
  </tr>
   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">
        发表论文</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">代表性论文：<br>[1]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Anlong&nbsp;Ming,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;“A&nbsp;Binary-Classification-Tree&nbsp;based&nbsp;Framework&nbsp;for&nbsp;Distributed&nbsp;Target&nbsp;Classification&nbsp;in&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;INFOCOM&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;Orlando,&nbsp;Florida&nbsp;USA,&nbsp;Match&nbsp;25-30,&nbsp;2012.&nbsp;(INFOCOM为中国计算机学会推荐A类国际学术会议，INFOCOM&nbsp;2012录用率18%)<br>[2]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Yuning&nbsp;Song,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;“Physarum&nbsp;Optimization:&nbsp;A&nbsp;Biology-Inspired&nbsp;Algorithm&nbsp;for&nbsp;Minimal&nbsp;Exposure&nbsp;Path&nbsp;Problem&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;INFOCOM&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;Orlando,&nbsp;Florida&nbsp;USA,&nbsp;Match&nbsp;25-30,&nbsp;2012.&nbsp;(INFOCOM为中国计算机学会推荐A类国际学术会议，INFOCOM&nbsp;2012录用率18%)<br>[3]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“Optimal&nbsp;Density&nbsp;Estimation&nbsp;for&nbsp;Exposure-Path&nbsp;Prevention&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks&nbsp;Using&nbsp;Percolation&nbsp;Theory,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;INFOCOM&nbsp;2012&nbsp;(Mini-Conference),&nbsp;Orlando,&nbsp;Florida&nbsp;USA,&nbsp;Match&nbsp;25-30,&nbsp;2012.&nbsp;(INFOCOM为中国计算机学会推荐A类国际学术会议，INFOCOM&nbsp;2012录用率18%)<br>[4]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;On&nbsp;Coverage&nbsp;of&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks&nbsp;for&nbsp;Rolling&nbsp;Terrains,&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Parallel&nbsp;and&nbsp;Distributed&nbsp;Systems,&nbsp;Jan.&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;23(1):118-125.&nbsp;<br>[5]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“Localization-Oriented&nbsp;Coverage&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Camera&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Communications,&nbsp;Feb.&nbsp;2011,&nbsp;10(2):&nbsp;484-494.&nbsp;<br>[6]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“Optimal&nbsp;Node&nbsp;Selection&nbsp;for&nbsp;Target&nbsp;Localization&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Camera&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Vehicular&nbsp;Technology,&nbsp;Sept.&nbsp;2010,&nbsp;59(7):&nbsp;3562-3576.&nbsp;<br>[7]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“Dynamic&nbsp;Node&nbsp;Collaboration&nbsp;for&nbsp;Mobile&nbsp;Target&nbsp;Tracking&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Camera&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;INFOCOM&nbsp;2009,&nbsp;Rio&nbsp;De&nbsp;Janeiro,&nbsp;Brazil,&nbsp;April&nbsp;19-25,&nbsp;2009.&nbsp;(INFOCOM为中国计算机学会推荐A类国际学术会议，INFOCOM&nbsp;2009录用率19%)<br>[8]&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Xi&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;“Coverage&nbsp;Analysis&nbsp;for&nbsp;Target&nbsp;Localization&nbsp;in&nbsp;Camera&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks,”&nbsp;Wiley&nbsp;Journal&nbsp;of&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Communications&nbsp;and&nbsp;Mobile&nbsp;Computing,&nbsp;online.</td>
